title: A live blog.
description: Holds attributes of an ANS live blog

https:__raw.githubusercontent.com_washin.title: Globally Unique ID trait
https:__raw.githubusercontent.com_washin.description: A globally unique identifier of the content in the ANS repository.

https:__raw.githubusercontent.com_washin.title: Describes the ANS version of this object
https:__raw.githubusercontent.com_washin.description: The version of ANS that this object was serialized as, in major.minor.patch format.

https:__raw.githubusercontent.com_washin.title: Created Date
https:__raw.githubusercontent.com_washin.description: When the content was originally created (RFC3339-formatted).

https:__raw.githubusercontent.com_washin.title: Last Updated Date
https:__raw.githubusercontent.com_washin.description: When the content was last updated (RFC3339-formatted).

https:__raw.githubusercontent.com_washin.title: Headlines
https:__raw.githubusercontent.com_washin.description: The headline(s) for the content.

https:__raw.githubusercontent.com_washin.title: Sub-Headlines
https:__raw.githubusercontent.com_washin.description: The sub-headline(s) for the content.

https:__raw.githubusercontent.com_washin.title: Description
https:__raw.githubusercontent.com_washin.description: The descriptions, or blurbs, for the content.

https:__raw.githubusercontent.com_washin.title: Credit trait
https:__raw.githubusercontent.com_washin.description: People and groups attributed to this content, keyed by type of contribution.

https:__raw.githubusercontent.com_washin.title: An author of a piece of content.
https:__raw.githubusercontent.com_washin.description: Models attribution to an individual or group for contribution towards some content item.

type.description: Indicates that this is an author

org.description: The name of the organization the contributor belongs to.

bio.description: A description/short bio of the contributor.

url.description: A url to some deeper set of information about the contributor.

https:__raw.githubusercontent.com_washin.title: An image.
https:__raw.githubusercontent.com_washin.description: Holds attributes of an ANS image component.

https:__raw.githubusercontent.com_washin.title: Subtype trait
https:__raw.githubusercontent.com_washin.description: A more granular type than story, gallery, etc. (E.g., column, blog_post)

https:__raw.githubusercontent.com_washin.title: Describes language for an element
https:__raw.githubusercontent.com_washin.description: The primary language of the content. The value should follow IETF BCP47. (e.g. 'en', 'es-419', etc.)

https:__raw.githubusercontent.com_washin.title: Copyright information
https:__raw.githubusercontent.com_washin.description: A copyright notice.

https:__raw.githubusercontent.com_washin.title: Canonical URL
https:__raw.githubusercontent.com_washin.description: The fully qualified URL to the story.

https:__raw.githubusercontent.com_washin.title: Short_Url
https:__raw.githubusercontent.com_washin.description: A url-shortened version of the canonical url.

https:__raw.githubusercontent.com_washin.title: Publish_Date
https:__raw.githubusercontent.com_washin.description: When the story was published.

https:__raw.githubusercontent.com_washin.title: Display_Date
https:__raw.githubusercontent.com_washin.description: The RFC3339-formatted dated time of the most recent date the story was (re)displayed on a public site.

https:__raw.githubusercontent.com_washin.title: Location related trait
https:__raw.githubusercontent.com_washin.description: A description of the location, useful if a full address or lat/long specification is overkill.

https:__raw.githubusercontent.com_washin.title: Geo
https:__raw.githubusercontent.com_washin.description: Latitidue and Longitude of the content

https:__raw.githubusercontent.com_washin.title: Address
https:__raw.githubusercontent.com_washin.description: An Address following the convention of http://microformats.org/wiki/hcard

https:__raw.githubusercontent.com_washin.title: Has additional properties
https:__raw.githubusercontent.com_washin.description: A grab-bag object for non-validatable data.

https:__raw.githubusercontent.com_washin.title: Editor_Note
https:__raw.githubusercontent.com_washin.description: Additional information to be displayed near the content from the editor.

https:__raw.githubusercontent.com_washin.title: Status
https:__raw.githubusercontent.com_washin.description: Optional field to story story workflow related status (e.g. published/embargoed/etc)

https:__raw.githubusercontent.com_washin.title: Taxonomy
https:__raw.githubusercontent.com_washin.description: Holds the collection of tags, categories, keywords, etc that describe content.

https:__raw.githubusercontent.com_washin.title: Keyword
https:__raw.githubusercontent.com_washin.description: Models a keyword used in describing a piece of content.

keyword.description: The keyword used to describe a piece of content

score.description: An arbitrary weighting to give the keyword

tag.description: The Part of Speech tag for this keyword.

frequency.description: An optional count of the frequency of the keyword as it appears in the content it describes

https:__raw.githubusercontent.com_washin.title: Topic
https:__raw.githubusercontent.com_washin.description: Models a topic used in describing a piece of content.

_id.description: The unique identifier for this topic.

name.description: The general name for this topic.

score.description: An arbitrary weighting to give the topic

uid.description: A short identifier for this topic. Usually used in cases where a long form id cannot work.

https:__raw.githubusercontent.com_washin.title: Auxiliary
https:__raw.githubusercontent.com_washin.description: Models a auxiliary used in targeting a piece of content.

_id.description: The unique identifier for this auxiliary.

name.description: The general name for this auxiliary.

uid.description: A short identifier for this auxiliary. Usually used in cases where a long form id cannot work.

https:__raw.githubusercontent.com_washin.title: Tag
https:__raw.githubusercontent.com_washin.description: Models a keyword used in describing a piece of content.

https:__raw.githubusercontent.com_washin.title: Site
https:__raw.githubusercontent.com_washin.description: A hierarchical section or 'site' in a taxonomy.

description.description: A short description or tagline about this site

path.description: The url path to this site

parent_id.description: The id of this section's parent site, if any

https:__raw.githubusercontent.com_washin.title: Representation of a normalized element
https:__raw.githubusercontent.com_washin.description: This represents a reference to external content that should be denormalized

type.description: The ANS type that the provider should return.

service.description: The type of interaction the provider expects. E.g., 'oembed'

id.description: The id passed to the provider to retrieve an ANS document

provider.description: A URL that can resolve the id into an ANS element

https:__raw.githubusercontent.com_washin.title: Promo Items
https:__raw.githubusercontent.com_washin.description: List of promotional content to use when highlighting the story.

https:__raw.githubusercontent.com_washin.title: A content object.
https:__raw.githubusercontent.com_washin.description: Holds common attributes of ANS Content objects.

https:__raw.githubusercontent.com_washin.title: Related_Content
https:__raw.githubusercontent.com_washin.description: A set of lists of IDs referencing other content items this story is related to.

https:__raw.githubusercontent.com_washin.title: Owner information
https:__raw.githubusercontent.com_washin.description: Trait that applies a owner information to a document or resource.

owner.description: Information about the owner of this content.

id.description: The unique identifier for this owner.

https:__raw.githubusercontent.com_washin.title: Scheduling information
https:__raw.githubusercontent.com_washin.description: Trait that applies planning information to a document or resource.

planned_publish_date.description: When the content is planned to be published.

scheduled_publish_date.description: When the content was first published.

word_count_planned.description: The anticipated number of words in the story.

inch_count_planned.description: The anticipated length of the story in inches.

inch_count_actual.description: The current length of the story in inches.

https:__raw.githubusercontent.com_washin.title: Revision
https:__raw.githubusercontent.com_washin.description: Revision information for this object

revision_id.description: The unique id of this revision.

parent_id.description: The unique id of the revision that this revisions was branched from, or preceded it on the current branch.

branch.description: The name of the branch this revision was created on.

editions.description: A list of identifiers of editions that point to this revision.

user_id.description: The unique user id of the person who created this revision.

published.description: Whether or not this revision's parent story is published, in any form or place

https:__raw.githubusercontent.com_washin.title: Syndication
https:__raw.githubusercontent.com_washin.description: Key-boolean pair of syndication services where this article may go

https:__raw.githubusercontent.com_washin.title: Source
https:__raw.githubusercontent.com_washin.description: Information about the original source and/or owner of this content

https:__raw.githubusercontent.com_washin.title: Tracking
https:__raw.githubusercontent.com_washin.description: Tracking information, probably implementation-dependent

https:__raw.githubusercontent.com_washin.title: Comments
https:__raw.githubusercontent.com_washin.description: Comment configuration data

https:__raw.githubusercontent.com_washin.title: Label
https:__raw.githubusercontent.com_washin.description: What the Washington Post calls a Kicker

https:__raw.githubusercontent.com_washin.title: Slug
https:__raw.githubusercontent.com_washin.description: A short reference name for internal editorial use

https:__raw.githubusercontent.com_washin.title: Social Links
https:__raw.githubusercontent.com_washin.description: Links to various social media

https:__raw.githubusercontent.com_washin.title: A collection of content.
https:__raw.githubusercontent.com_washin.description: Holds attributes of an ANS collection - a common parent to story and gallery objects.

https:__raw.githubusercontent.com_washin.title: An element that can be listed as part of content elements
https:__raw.githubusercontent.com_washin.description: An item that conforms to this schema can be rendered in a sequence

https:__raw.githubusercontent.com_washin.title: Channel trait
https:__raw.githubusercontent.com_washin.description: An optional list of output types for which this element should be visible
